description: The solicitation is for TruNAS servers and related characteristics. Bidders can submit offer.
duration_in_months: For specific details of the evaluation criteria and the weight assigned to each factor, consult the solicitation document. Deadline is February 26th.
tags: Shared Services Canada –IT and Legal, Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
## TruNAS Server Purchase Request for Department of National Defence

### Request for Proposal

#### Government of Canada Invitation to Tender

The Minister of Public Services and Procurement is issuing a Competitive - Open bidding Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of TruNAS servers (or equivalent) for the Department of National Defence.

**Bidder Details**

* Invitations to Tender: SSC-24-00025202:T
* Solicitation Number: BPM020576/25202
* Publication Date: February 7, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 26, 2024, 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Time)

**Contract Requirements**

* The contractor must provide TruNAS servers (or equivalent) that meet the technical specifications of the solicitation
* The contractor must be able to deliver the TruNAS servers (or equivalent) within a reasonable timeframe

**Response Instructions**

* Interested parties can register with the SSC P2P portal to access the solicitation and submit a response
* Bidders are required to have a SSC P2P portal account to submit a response

**Contact Information**

* Name: Clara Whittaker
* Email: [None]
* Phone: 343-553-8354
* Fax: 343-553-8354

**Attachments**

* [Attachment 1: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/A1C84C53-62B8-4F0E-A7F6-626F2607F208]
* [Attachment 2: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/43E5CB0E-4CF3-442E-A2D6-CF60885EDEA7]
* [Attachment 3: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/84730E99-3A65-406E-8F65-BE46B7538522]

**Downloading Attachments**

To download the attachments, please visit the following link: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/browser 

The contract award will be based on the best value for money, considering factors such as price, functionality, and excellent technical specifications.
